attr.title: Cognizance
attr.inst: Download the game (for free) here: https://managore.itch.io/cognizance -- extract the .exe as if it's a 7-Zip archive (which it is) and copy the files to the port gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game (for free) here: [https://managore.itch.io/cognizance](https://managore.itch.io/cognizance) -- extract the *.exe* as if it's a 7-Zip archive (which it is), and copy the files to the port *gamedata* folder.
